articles.author: Kieran Lynch
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe and Paul Pogba are among the players who clubs can speak to over free transfer TODAY - Daily Mail
articles.description: The New Year has arrived and time has run out for clubs across Europe to tie their players down to new deals as 'pre-contract' season gets very much underway. Sportsmail looks at who is available.
articles.content:
The New Year has arrived and time has run out for clubs across Europe to tie their players down to new deals as 'pre-contract season' rolls into town.
Some of the world's biggest stars are now in th… [+20061 chars]
